sources.title: A Bout with a Trout (1947)
sources.description: Little Lulu, torn between playing hookey and going fishing, or going to school, chooses to go fishing...where she encounters the Fish from Cartoon Hades. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-bout-with-a-trout-1947/

metadata.Plot: Little Lulu, torn between playing hookey and going fishing, or going to school, chooses to go fishing...where she encounters the Fish from Cartoon Hades.
metadata.Actors: Mae Questel, Jack Mercer, Cecil Roy
